text: "Bad Habits" is a song recorded by English singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran. It was released on June 24, 2021, as the lead single from his fifth studio album, = (2021). The song is a dance-pop song and is the first of this genre released by Sheeran. It is in B minor. It was written by Sheeran, Fred Gibson, and Johnny McDaid, with production by the three along with Parisi and Graham Archer. The song reached number one in Australia, Canada, and the UK and the top two in the U.S. == Charts == Chart performance for "Bad Habits" Chart (2021) Peak position == References == Category:2021 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs
title: Bad Habits (Ed Sheeran song)
